summary: The diff successfully implements all three requirements. REQ-21 adds a dedicated service area section on the homepage with elegant styling and a MapPin icon. REQ-22 updates the Layout footer to include service area information near phone numbers with a MapPin icon. REQ-23 adds service area badges to the homepage contact section. All implementations use the exact text 'Serving Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts' and maintain the rose gold aesthetic.
